name: LightSpeed Slalom
description:
Description

Homage to the classic game Jet Slalom. Dodge the cones and see how far you can make it. Close flybys earn bonus points, and make the next level come sooner!

Controls

<- / -> (arrow keys): Move left or right

Credits

  • Music
    • TimeQ by Zodik (used under CC-BY-3.0) - https://opengameart.org/content/zodik-timeq
  • Sound effects
    • Electric Sound Effects Library by Little Robot Sound Factory (used under CC-BY-3.0) - www.littlerobotsoundfactory.com
